trends: There has been one other sighting in Iron Mountain
There were no other sightings in Iron Mountain on or around January 31st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went to let the dog out and noticed that there were some unusual lights hovering over lake michigan , these lights were white , red and blue, they would go from white to red to blue and then no lights for a few seconds and then the sequence would repeat. this object stayed stationary for 25 mins in the same spot . I live near the lake and am used to airline traffic and see planes ofthen but this was not a plane and I dont see any planes stay in the same spot for that length of time . not sure what I saw but know that it was not a plane .
Summary: strange lights hovering over lake michigan
